comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: First, if you refer to banner html, you should know that banner ads have been discontiued by forum boss since last year.But there are some people who think the signature space (like the one I use) is a banner ad as well, where you need to rank higher to be able to use a better looking signature. To create such, there are several designers of this forum that you can contact. See here...

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: @OP it's better to make clear what are you mean about forum banner?Aside from forum banner ads, signature space, there's another one which ANN banner.You can check the thread which mentioned by above user, personally most people are prefer to hire jayce because he's very experienced and well known about this matter. Don't forget to looking a trusted campaign manager if you're want to run a signature campaign.
